Brazil: São Luís is founded by the French, who intend to make it the center of the Equinoctial France. They build a fort named Saint-Louis de Maragnan after King Louis XIII and his Saintly ancestor Louis IX.
Chile: Beginning of the Defensive War phase (promoted by Luis de Valdivia) in the Arauco War.
India: East India Company (to 1857 – Indian Rebellion of 1857, Meerut)
Russia: Polish–Russian War (1609–1618): Muscovite populace rising against the Poles recaptured the Kremlin.
